channel.title: doug on Douglas Ezra Morrison
channel.description: Recent content in doug on Douglas Ezra Morrison

item.description: I am a graduating doctoral student at UCLA, where I have been advised by Ron Brookmeyer, Tom Belin, Sudipto Banerjee, and Onyebuchi Arah. I have worked on a variety of applied and theoretical statistical challenges, including problems in causal inference, data fusion, and infectious disease surveillance. For the past year, I have served as the Vice President of Financial Affairs for the UCLA Biostatistics Student Association.
